data.name: RPG Maker MV - Karugamo Fantasy BGM Pack 07
data.detailed_description:
Let your fantasy take flight with the seventh selection of music tracks!

Karugamo Fantasy BGM 07 brings you more and expands on the ever popular staples of video game music with a focus on battles, high energy and darkness: mystical, suspense, dramatic, medieval, energetic rock, arcade rock, triumphant, and cut-scene/event. Whether you're on the lookout for the perfect theme for your epic saga or simply in need of creative music to listen to while you map, you can't go wrong with Karugamo Fantasy!

Features:

  • 21 BGM themes, in OGG and M4A formats.
  • Instruments and composition styles you would find in many JRPGs
  • Royalty-free music you can use in your RPG Maker MV games

    Tracklist:

    1 - KBF_Battle_Boss_07
    2 - KBF_Battle_Boss_08
    3 - KBF_Battle_Boss_09
    4 - KBF_Battle_Boss_EW01
    5 - KBF_Battle_Boss_EW02

    12 - KBF_Battle_Nomal_EW01_A
    13 - KBF_Battle_Nomal_EW01_B
    14 - KBF_Battle_Nomal_EW02
    15 - KBF_Event_Escape_02
    16 - KBF_Event_Evil_05
    17 - KBF_Event_Evil_06
    18 - KBF_Event_Evil_07
    19 - KBF_Event_Evil_EW01_A
    20 - KBF_Event_Evil_EW01_B
    21 - KBF_Event_Evil_EW02
